Extends existing type with additional attributes.

An Hybris e-service (request) maps to a service request in SAP CRM. Each e-service (request) is associated to a service type. Service type is the Hybris e-services term for process type in SAP CRM. In SAP CRM each service request is associated to a process type.

attribute.description: Indicates whether a service type shall be considered for e-service (request) overview(s).
Indicates whether a service type category shall be considered for e-service (request) overview(s). Note that this flag applies only to overview relevant service types.

itemtype.description: A service type can be associated with multiple category hierarchies. A category hierarchy consists of at least one category (level 1). A category can have multiple sub-categories which can be nested as well (level 2, level 3, etc.).
A status (e.g. for service request processing) has a code and a language-dependent name.
